title: New: Noble Oak – Inside
content:
Another cut from one of my favourite producers at the moment, and it may well be his best yet.

Inside is a gloriously enchanting journey, with Noble Oak fashioning a luxurious, expansive soundscape, complimented by his own sampled vocals. Having been following Noble Oak for a few months now, it’s fantastic to hear him maturing as an artist, and this track certainly marks a progression. This is music to truly lose yourself in, turn it up real loud and float away.

Inside by Noble Oak
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
